page.title: 04 OUR SCHOOL.
page.content:
Our school was opened in 1914 and originally it was two separate schools from 1914-1937. The schools joined together in 1937.After the Second World War it became Whitley Bay Grammar School. Since 1973 it has been known as Marden Bridge Middle School.
The age of the children at this schoolo is 9-13 years .The children that come to this school will have been to a first school from 5-9 years of age.After a child has been to first and middle school he has to go to a high school from 13-16 or 18 if he stays on to get his "A" levels. Our school is a comprehensive school and this means a school for all abilities,but in 1945 you had to pass an exam to get into this school. I think our school is fairly good
